Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 16: Allu Arjun film glides past ₹1000 crore mark as it enters 3rd week - Hindustan Times
summary:
Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 16

Date: December 20, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Sukumar's Pushpa 2: The Rule continues to perform exceptionally well at the box office, crossing the ₹1000 crore mark in just 16 days.

  • The film collected approximately ₹12.11 crore on day 16, totaling around ₹1002.71 crore net in India.
  • In its first week, the film made ₹725.8 crore net, followed by ₹264.8 crore in the second week.
  • Despite a 63.52% decrease in collections from week one to week two, the film's performance remains impressive.
  • It grossed ₹632.50 crore net from Hindi markets alone in its first 15 days.
  • World-wide, the film surpassed ₹1500 crore within 14 days.
“Enjoy the Biggest Film #Pushpa2 only on the Big Screens in this Biggest Holiday Season.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2: The Rule is not only a commercial success but also a significant cultural phenomenon, resonating widely with audiences across various demographics.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 The Rule Box Office Success: Allu Arjun's Film Surpasses ₹1000 Crore

title: Brad Pitt faces allegations of hiding 'embezzled property' amid War of Rose with Angelina Jolie - Hindustan Times
summary:
Brad Pitt Faces Allegations of Hiding Embezzled Property in Legal Battle with Angelina Jolie

Publication Date & Source: December 2024, Hindustan Times

Brad Pitt has been accused of hiding “embezzled assets” amid a legal dispute with Angelina Jolie over Chateau Miraval, the French winery they purchased together. The ongoing court battle highlights serious allegations of financial misconduct related to the ownership and management of the winery.

  • Pitt is accused of concealing funds and diverting them for personal use instead of business purposes.
  • The legal dispute began in 2022, following Jolie's intent to exit their business partnership.
  • Jolie countersued for $250 million, claiming Pitt froze her out of operations.
  • Tenute del Mondo has alleged Pitt's team misappropriated funds intended for the winery.
  • Legal negotiations have involved claims and counterclaims between both parties regarding asset ownership.
“[Brad] caused Chateau Miraval’s funds and assets to be spent on his personal expenses and to be diverted to his other business ventures rather than be paid out as dividends.”

The allegations have escalated the ongoing conflict, with both parties seeking to protect their financial interests in the winery. The outcome of this dispute may have lasting implications on their business dealings and personal lives.
newTitle: Brad Pitt Faces Allegations of Hiding Embezzled Property in Legal Battle with Angelina Jolie

title: ‘Viduthalai Part 2’ movie review: Vijay Sethupathi powers Vetri Maaran’s sequel where ideology outweighs intimate storytelling - The Hindu
summary:
‘Viduthalai Part 2’ movie review: Vijay Sethupathi powers Vetri Maaran’s sequel where ideology outweighs intimate storytelling

Published: December 20, 2024 07:44 pm IST
Source: The Hindu

The film explores the character of Perumal Vaathiyaar, played by Vijay Sethupathi, as he transforms from an unassuming teacher to a leader of a separatist group in a politically charged narrative.

  • The sequel focuses on the systemic oppression faced by characters and the political environment.
  • Vetri Maaran’s direction is praised for its technical aspects, especially during action sequences.
  • The film runs for 170 minutes and features a strong performance from Vijay Sethupathi.
  • The narrative suffers from preachiness and lacks the emotional depth of its predecessor.
“Despite a strong political core that puts out a message that’s unfortunately relevant even in today’s world, the sequel lacks the emotions that worked wonders with the first part.”

Overall, while the film tackles significant themes and performances, it struggles with pacing and depth compared to the original.
newTitle: ‘Viduthalai Part 2’ movie review: Vijay Sethupathi powers Vetri Maaran’s sequel where ideology outweighs intimate storytelling

title: Honey Singh recalls ‘wishing for death' as he talks about fighting mental illness in his documentary: ‘I saw hell’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Honey Singh talks about fighting bipolar disorder, ‘wishing for his death everyday’ in his documentary Yo Yo Honey Singh Famous.

Date: Dec 20, 2024 08:10 PM IST | Source: Hindustan Times

Honey Singh's documentary, 'Yo Yo Honey Singh: Famous,' released on Netflix, addresses his ongoing struggles with mental health, including a discussion about his experiences with bipolar disorder.

  • The documentary reveals Honey's journey through mental illness, where he described feeling like he was living in hell.
  • He recounted moments during a tour that triggered his symptoms of paranoia and depression.
  • Honey Singh explained the psychological impact of his illness, describing hallucinations and severe anxiety.
  • He emphasized the depth of his struggles, highlighting how he wished for death every day.
  • The film provides an intimate look at his personal and professional life, showing the support from family, friends, and collaborators.
“I saw hell. I wished for death every day.” - Honey Singh

The documentary serves as a deeply personal portrayal of a talented artist’s battle with mental health and his journey towards recovery.
newTitle: Honey Singh Discusses His Battle with Mental Illness in New Documentary

Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna's Pushpa 2 The Rule has achieved a remarkable milestone by becoming the biggest Hindi net grosser of all time, grossing ₹621 crore in just 15 days.

  • Pushpa 2 is directed by Sukumar and is a sequel to the hit Pushpa The Rise.

Pushpa 2 continues to captivate audiences and set new records at the box office.

  • Expert Dr. Jagadish Hiremath notes significant health benefits from weight loss in middle age, including reduced obesity-related risks.
  • Challenges include hormonal changes, behavioral patterns, physical limitations, and psychological impacts in middle age.
  • Precautions for sustainable weight loss include medical oversight, gradual progression, nutritional balance, and muscle preservation strategies.
“Losing 42 kg during middle age is a significant achievement, as it involves overcoming metabolic, hormonal, and psychological challenges unique to this phase of life.” - Dr. Jagadish Hiremath

title: Arjun Kapoor opens up about ‘impulsive’ decision to be there for ex-partner Malaika Arora after her father’s death: ‘I have a fear of loss’ - The Indian Express
summary:

Publication Date: October 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

Actor Arjun Kapoor opened up about the decision to be there for his ex-partner Malaika Arora following the death of her adopted father. He shared insights into his past relationships and how personal traumas influence his approach to love.

  • Kapoor discussed his emotional bond with Arora and the impulse to support her in difficult times.
  • He reflected on the impact of his mother’s death and his parents’ separation on his romantic relationships.
  • In a podcast interview, Kapoor emphasized the importance of being present for loved ones regardless of circumstances.
  • He also commented on the challenges of public relationships in today’s media landscape.
  • Kapoor expressed that his fear of loss stems from his childhood experiences, affecting his commitment to relationships.
“There’s a difference. My mom left me, my father made a choice. So, there’s a fear of loss. There’s a feeling that eventually, everyone will leave.” - Arjun Kapoor

In conclusion, Arjun Kapoor's reflections highlight the complexities of relationships, particularly how past experiences shape one’s approach to love and support in times of need.
newTitle: Arjun Kapoor Reflects on Supporting Malaika Arora After Her Father's Death

title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 15: 1 Historical Record In Only 62 Days – Allu Arjun’s Blockbuster Beats Stree 2 To Become #1 Hindi Film Of All Time! - Koimoi
summary:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 15: 1 Historical Record In Only 62 Days – Allu Arjun’s Blockbuster B

Publication Date: December 19, 2024

Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, and Fahadh Faasil starrer has finally broken the most significant record in Hindi cinema. It has surpassed Stree 2 to become the highest-grossing film ever. If that’s not enough, the action thriller has also registered the biggest day 15 collection of all time.

Key Points:

  • Pushpa 2 is now the highest-grossing Hindi film with a total collection of 632.50 crores.
  • The film earned 14 crores on day 15, the highest day 15 collection ever.
  • It surpassed Stree 2’s previous record of 627.50 crores.
  • Pushpa 2’s collections indicate a strong performance with a dip of only 17% from the previous day.
  • The movie could reach the 700 crore mark, a first in Hindi cinema history.
